content: Christie wants to withhold funds from Amtrak?  For what reason?  To teach them a lesson?  He has already shown his complete incompetence and disrespect for daily train riders by obstructing the plainly needed third rail tunnel under the Hudson.  "Leadership" like this has awful consequences that adversely affect quality of life and regional economy for generations.  When will we have had our fill of egocentric place-holders avoiding the critical work of their offices while they look for their next damaging job?
